definition: Xuankong Temple or Suspended Temple near Yanyuan in Shanxi
to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation

sentences.english: The superior geographical position is one which of substantial clauses Xuankong Temple can preserve complete.
sentences.chinese: 优越的地理位置是悬空寺能完好保存的重要原因之一。

sentences.english: In a moment, we're going to learn Chinese at Xuankong Temple on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 一会儿我们就要去山上的悬空寺学汉语。

sentences.english: Bukak Monastery of Hengshan is rare in the world.
sentences.chinese: 北岳恒山的悬空寺更是世间罕见。

sentences.english: Qingyin Pavilion is known as the second largest suspended temple on the Daciyan Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 清音阁被称作是大慈岩的第二悬空寺。

sentences.english: So people also customarily call it Xuangkong Si instead of Xuankong Guan.
sentences.chinese: 所以人们就习惯性地称它为悬空寺。

sentences.english: Viewer friends, the Xuangkong Temple is indeed very dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 观众朋友们，这悬空寺真是悬啊。

sentences.english: Baoxiang Temple Baoxiang Temple was constructed in the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 宝相寺被誉为云南“悬空寺”始建于元代。

definition: the Yingxian wooden pagoda or Sakyamuni Pagoda near Datong in Shanxi province
Mt Heng in Shanxi, northern mountain of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]/Hengshan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
Yungang Caves at Datong 大同, Shanxi 山西

rock cave/grotto/cliff caves (often with Buddhist statues)
Mt Hua in Shaanxi, western mountain of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]
Mt Maiji Caves at Tianshui 天水, Gansu
